tracks.text: Military base
The soldier hits his head with the Canadian dictionary
At the house, Petey presses a button on a device wired to a shoebox. The shoe brand, Dirty Sl√ºt Shoes, is crossed out, and the box is labelled 'Universe'.
She throws the box into his lap.
He presses a button
Blue light gathers into an orb
The orb flickers, disappears, then explodes in white then yellow light. We zoom out to see a yellow sun and 2 planets.
Stephen Hawking
The racoon steals the pasta while Jimmy isn't looking. Petey tosses his Universe box, which lands on the racoon, killing it.
Petey kicks a can in a parking lot.
McCool catches it. Typed text, RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool
McCool tosses it to Petey. It hits him on the head.
Cookie opens her altar cabinet
She's a tanned girl with shoulder length black hair, a low cut top revealing a large chest.
She blows him a kiss
She pulls up his hoodie. He looks at a bedraggled Jesus nailed to a cross
A shadow rises over the house.
Rain and lightning
Jesus stares. Petey swallows. Jesus glares and makes an X with his fingers.
Scrabble
F E L L
A T I O
Petey has long hair and wears a robe. The family gapes.
Theresa and Gina slap Petey
A church
He pushes her knees
She reaches for his robe
He gets to his knees. Brenda rolls her eyes.
They look at each other over a candle.
A priest approaches and waves a wand. Brenda recoils from drops of water.
Petey enters a confessional. Brenda crosses her arms.
Brenda enters the confessional.
Time passes
The priest exits and zips up his pants.
In an alley, Jimmy pulls out cash and hands it to Brenda.
2 men kiss under a flower arch. Petey holds a sign reading Adam and Even Not Bert and Ernie. Brenda frowns, holding a sign reading Penises are for peeing.
Brenda and Petey throw rocks at a hockey player kissing Theresa.
Jimmy hands Brenda more cash.
Petey throws a burning wine bottle. People flee from an abortion clinic, which catches fire. Brenda and Petey laugh and embrace.
Brenda drops off Petey at his house.
She takes cash from Jimmy and stuffs it in her cleavage
Petey walks down an urban sidewalk.
He looks down an alley. Brenda wears a ballgown and laughs with an older man who presents jewelry.
At the house, Jimmy lies on the couch and balances a beer can on his stomach.
She deploys a switchblade
At the University of Regina, in a lecture hall
Brenda hides
She walks away. At Pam Anderson's Park & Waterslide, Petey sits on children's swings. A kid approaches.
The kid runs by Jimmy
